# Acquisition system metadata element schema

**Description:** Acquisition system metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

## Power Line Frequency

**Label:** powerLineFrequency

**Description:** Frequency (in Hz) of the power line at the setup location.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** Hz

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/2e516a8d-ab63-4008-8029-3e6dcd86a5b9) <details>

## Manufacturer

**Label:** manufacturer

**Description:** Manufacturer of the acquisition system (e.g. "OpenEphys”, “Alphaomega",”Blackrock”)

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/e06a44bb-a6ac-4d98-9ec3-25332127f85b) <details>


## Sampling Frequency

**Label:** samplingFrequency

**Description:** Internal (maximum) sampling frequency of the recording in Hz.

**Required:** Yes

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** Hz

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/2e39f306-8558-46c3-b3d6-1b007cdc8b06) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
```
